Content as a Service

From a product name to rich, high-quality content ‚Äî fully automated with AI.

How it works

Our AI-powered content enrichment pipeline turns minimal product input into comprehensive, publish-ready content. No copywriters needed. No hours of research. Just results.

1

You provide a product name

That's it. Give us a name like "Selmer Mark VI" and optionally a category (e.g. "Saxophones"). We take it from there.

2

AI researches & enriches

Our enrichment pipeline uses multiple AI models and data sources to gather product details, specifications, history, use cases, and more.

3

Content is generated

You receive rich product descriptions, SEO-optimized copy, technical specs, and curated images ‚Äî all formatted and ready to publish.

4

Delivered via API or export

Content is delivered through our API, as a data export, or directly into your eCommerce platform. Integrate it however you want.

What you get

üìù Product descriptions

Engaging, SEO-friendly copy that tells the story of your product. Multiple lengths available ‚Äî from short snippets to full-page descriptions.

üìä Technical specifications

Structured spec sheets extracted and formatted from multiple sources. Consistent format across your entire catalog.

üñºÔ∏è Product images

AI-curated and generated product imagery. From clean product shots to lifestyle context images.

üè∑Ô∏è Metadata & tags

Auto-generated categories, tags, attributes, and SEO metadata. Makes your products discoverable.

üåç Multilingual

Content generated in multiple languages out of the box. Reach international markets without translation costs.

‚ö° Bulk processing

Upload a CSV with thousands of product names ‚Äî we'll enrich them all. Scale your catalog without scaling your team.

Example: Selmer Mark VI

Input

Product: Selmer Mark VI
Category: Saxophones
‚Üí

Output

Title: Selmer Mark VI ‚Äî The most iconic saxophone ever made

Description: The Selmer Mark VI is widely regarded as the gold standard of saxophones. Produced from 1954 to 1981, this French-made instrument defined the sound of jazz, from John Coltrane to Sonny Rollins. Known for its warm, rich tone and exceptional response across all registers...

Specs: Material: Brass ¬∑ Key: Various (Alto, Tenor, Soprano, Baritone) ¬∑ Origin: Paris, France ¬∑ Production: 1954‚Äì1981 ¬∑ Finish: Lacquer/Silver

Tags: saxophone, vintage, jazz, professional, selmer, woodwind
